thread.title: Owners expose their cats naughty antics on social media
thread.title_full: Owners expose their cats naughty antics on social media

title: Owners expose their cats naughty antics on social media
text: comments Anyone with a cat knows how mischievous their feline friend can be. And some owners have turned their pet cats into the brunt of internet jokes - by publicly shaming them online. Men and women have penned hilarious notes detailing their cat's mischievous actions and photographed the guilty felines next to them in a collection of images sweeping the web. From snaps of cats after they've indulged on too much cat nip to those caught leaping into a fish bowl, pet owners will certainly relate to these laugh out loud snaps. Pet owners have taken to the internet to shame their pet cats and showcase their guilty behaviour Funny owners have mocked their pet felines, including this fella who overindulged on his cat nip One forlorn pussy named Benny was named and shamed by his owner for gorging on the family's sausage stash One cat was shamed by his owners for nibbling at their phone chargers - but he didn't appear too guilty One hilarious photo caught a menacing looking cat in action An angry little white cat posed next to a warning sign to alert visitors of his tendencies In an awkward twits of fate, one cat broke into a relative's urn A perplexed and guilty looking cat was shamed for urinating on his fellow pet A nonchalant cat had a note propped up next to him explaining his diva antics A possessive cat was called out for his toy-hogging antics in an image sweeping the web A nonchalant cat's rather disgusting habits were exposed in a note A menacing black cat didn't look too impressed when his owners revealed his shameful behaviour One feline posed in a box emblazoned with his bad habits A sweet little cat wore a note around his neck revealing how he watched a mouse eat his food The hilarious notes exposing guilty cats are sweeping the internet this week A minxy female cat who spent a night on the town was shamed online A cat with bad toilet habits had them exposed in the viral internet forum One cat's peculiar voyeuristic behaviour was revealed in a note as he was snapped in the toilet One owner was clearly furious that his pet cat chowed down $300 of his money A sodden kitty was photographed just after he went for a quick dip in the fish tank A confused looking cat looked on as his owner revealed his disgusting toilet habits One sneaky cat was caught attempting to bury his sick - but trashed his owner's carpet in the process Two women penned a note about their kitten's distasteful behaviour One nonchalant cat was photographed with a sign exposing himself as an 'asshole' This owner doesn't seem to be the biggest fan of its pet cat who he dubbed a 'fat b*
